subSections.title: Etymology 1
Noun
Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|鼈と月|すっぽん と つき}}, {{ja-r|月と鼈|つき と すっぽん|the [[moon]] and ''suppon'' (seem [[alike]] but are [[different]]) → [[like chalk and cheese]]}}

subSections.title: Proverbs
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|鼈が時をつくる|すっぽん が とき を つくる}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|べつ}}

# {{lb|ja|rare|sort=へつ'}} a {{vern|Chinese softshell turtle}}, {{taxlink|Pelodiscus sinensis|species|ver=180803}}

subSections.title: Proverbs
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|鼈%人を食わんとして却って人に食わる|べつ% ひと を くわん と して かえって ひと に くわる}}
* {{ja-r|月鼈|げつべつ|the [[moon]] and ''suppon'' (seem [[alike]] but are [[different]]) → [[like chalk and cheese]]}}
